code: import'./FormStyle.css';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Form=()=>{const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData(event.target);const name=formData.get('name');const subject=formData.get('subject');const message=formData.get('message');localStorage.setItem('name',name);localStorage.setItem('subject',subject);localStorage.setItem('message',message);alert('Form data saved successfully!');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Your Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Subject"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{rows:"6",placeholder:"Type your message here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",children:"Submit"})]})});};export default Form;
